Class Champion

java.lang.Object
model.Champion
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, Purchasable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdamSmith, AugustoPinochet, AugustusCaesar, BernardMontgomery, CharlesDarwin, Confucius, DavidLange, DouglasMacArthur, DwightEisenhower, ElvisPresley, FranzFerdinand, GeorgeWashington, GhengisKhan, HarryTruman, JoeRogan, JohnBrowning, JohnDoe, JohnFKennedy, JohnMaynardKeynes, JosefStalin, KingGeorge, MarcusAurelius, MargaretThatcher, MarieCurie, MatthiasGalster, MiguelMorales, MikolosHorthy, NapoleonBonaparte, NeilArmstrong, NikitaKrustchev, PhilGarland, PhilippePetain, QueenVictoria, RobertMuldoon, RudyardKipling, ShokoAsahara, SimonHoermann, StephenHawking, SunTzu, TedKaczynski, TimBell, WilliamShakespeare
public abstract class Champion extends Object implements Purchasable, Cloneable
Champion Class, responsible for data and functionality related to each individual champion competing.

  • Constructor Details

    • Champion

      public Champion(String name, int staminaBoost, int regenBoost, int offenseBoost, int defenseBoost, float price, float priceChangeWeekly)
      Constructor for champion Class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the champion
      staminaBoost - Stat which modifies the maximum stamina of the champion
      regenBoost - Stat which modifies the regen of the champion
      offenseBoost - Modifies the offense stat of the champion
      defenseBoost - Modifies the defense stat of the champion
      price - The champions price
      priceChangeWeekly - The amount at which the champion's price changes each week once purchased

    • buy

      public void buy(Team team) throws InsufficientFundsException, FullTeamException, IllegalPurchaseException
      Buy the champion by adding it to the given team and deducting the champion price.
      Specified by:
      buy in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      team - the team that wants to buy the champion
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the team cannot afford this champion
      FullTeamException - if the team champion list is already full
      IllegalPurchaseException - if the team has already purchased a champion this week

    • sell

      public void sell(Team team)
      Sell the champion by removing it from the given team and refunding the champion price.
      Specified by:
      sell in interface Purchasable
      Parameters:
      team - the team that contains this champion

    • rest

      public void rest()
      Rests the champion, restoring them back to full health, Should be called at the end of each week
